txt.en: 'Come on, come on! Down to the Elder Hall! Everything's been laid out, time to try the best food Khûtra has to offer.'
Listen to the toast from Elder Roshat.
'Come on, come on! Down to the Elder Hall! Everything's been laid out, time to try the best food Khûtra has to offer.'
Give fish to Ekhmun
Drink with Roshat
Return to Elder Roshat in the centre of Khûtra.

'I am astounded. I misjudged you, and perhaps I misjudged the other travellers venturing through here. You are a boon to Khûtra, and I wish I had seen it sooner.

'You must let this foolish old man set accounts right. Come! We will prepare a feast in your honour!

'The only thing I ask of you is to help us with the preparations! Would you mind collecting some of the food? Gadir, down the road, has some wheat as a start.'
Listen to the toast from Elder Roshat
Give all the gathered ingredients to Ekhmun, the cook
Talk to Elder Roshat about the feast
'Here, take this wheat for the feast. You collected it anyway. It is only right that it goes to the feast. Sincerely, thank you for everything you've done.'
'Here, take all the khôrob I have left. You've earned it.'
Return to Elder Roshat
'Here we are. The first healthy fish we've caught in a month. Take them, with our thanks. You'll want to bring the ingredients to Ekhmun, the cook - he's just over there, talking to Ziriha.'
'I need all the ingredients before I can make the meal.'
You have healed Khûtra. Now Roshat is throwing a feast, and you are the guest of honour. Don't be late!
Pick up fish from Umaris, the fisher. She can be found by the fishing pier.
Pick up wheat from Gadir, the farmer. He can be found along the road to the Elder Hall.
Pick up jugs of khôrob from Ziriha, the merchant. She can be found by the fishing pier.
Deliver ingredients to Ekhmun, the cook. He can be found near Ziriha.
Pick up fish from Umaris, the fisher
'Friends...'
Give sheaf of wheat to Ekhmun
'Long we have feared the outside world, and long we have suffered for it.'
Give jugs of khôrob to Ekhmun
'I see that now. No more!'
'[placeholder], you will find a welcome hearth in Khûtra any time you visit.'
'A toast!'
'To new beginnings and old friends, and new friends that feel like old. Now pass the khôrob!'
Pick up sheaf of wheat from Gadir, the farmer
Pick up jugs of khôrob from Ziriha, the merchant
Return to Elder Roshat
Drink with Roshat
'That's a welcome sight. More food than I've seen in a fair few nights. Thanks for gathering all this! Leave it to me - I'll have everything ready before you can spit.'

'Friends, long we have feared the outside world, and long we have suffered for it. I see that now. No more! [placeholder], you will find a welcome hearth in Khûtra any time you visit.\n\n'A toast! To new beginnings and old friends, and new friends that feel like old. Now pass the khôrob!'
The Feast
